name: Data Populator
description: A plugin to populate your design mockups with meaningful data. Good Bye Lorem Ipsum. Hello JSON.
author: precious design studio

commands.name: Populate with Preset
commands.description: Please select the preset you'd like to populate your design with and configure the options.

commands.name: Populate with JSON
commands.description: Please select the JSON file you'd like to populate your design with and configure the options.

commands.name: Populate from URL
commands.description: Please enter the URL of the API from which you'd like to fetch live data to populate your design with and configure the options.

commands.name: Populate Again
commands.description: Re-populate the selected layers with the last used data.

commands.name: Last Used Data
commands.description: Your last used command, JSON, data path, data options and default substitute are shown below.

commands.name: Clear Layers
commands.description: Clear populated data from the selected layers.

commands.name: Reveal Presets Library
commands.description: Open the folder storing your presets library.

commands.name: Set Presets Library
commands.description: Choose the folder containing your preset library.

commands.name: Need Help?
commands.description: ind useful tips & tricks and ask for help.
